pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-subdomains=================Subdomain helpers for the Django framework, including subdomain-based URLrouting and reversing.Full documentation can be found here: http://django-subdomains.readthedocs.org/Build Status------------.. image:: https://secure.travis-ci.org/tkaemming/django-subdomains.png?branch=master :target: http://travis-ci.org/tkaemming/django-subdomainsTested on Python 2.6, 2.7, 3.4 and 3.5 on their supported Django versions from1.4 through 1.9.
